Today’s Special

Smoked Sodium

With 11 crispy protons, every 22.990u slice of pure sodium is ready to melt in your mouth at 97.794°C. Perfect with a side of chips in dishes such as smoked fish, meats, and poultry, pizza, salted nuts, and baking soda or de-icing roads in winter.

Ingredients

  • Element: Sodium
  • What: A soft metal that tarnishes within seconds of being exposed to the air. Reacts vigorously with water.
  • Chemical Symbol: Na
  • Atomic Number: 11
  • Atomic Mass: 22.99
  • Category: Alkali Metal

Specials

  • Sodium is the sixth most common element on Earth.
  • Your body contains about 100 grams of sodium but is constantly losing it and needs to replace it.
  • You probably eat about 10 grams of salt every day but we only need about 6 grams (about 2.3 grams of sodium).
